text: Of Plymouth Plantation is a book written by William Bradford between 1630 and 1651. It tells of the Pilgrims, of their years in Holland, their voyage on the Mayflower, the founding of Plymouth Colony in Massachusetts, and the colony's early years. The book ends with a list written in 1651 of Mayflower passengers and what happened to them. ==Other websites== *New England Religious History at Gordon College includes Of Plymouth Plantation and other works in a variety of formats. *Full Text "Of Plymouth Plantation" provided by google book search Category:Plymouth Colony Category:1650s books
title: Of Plymouth Plantation
